messages.title: Let's end 22 years of Labour Government...
messages.content: Welsh economy in decline before Covid hit. Wales' schools system has been ranked the worst in the UK for the fifth time running.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: 3,000 more nurses, 1,200 more doctors and 5 extra hospitals.
5,000 more teachers. More funding for every pupil.
Â£2 billion to upgrade major roads.
Scrapping business rates for small businesses.
